text: @billmaher I have a millennial child, & I do not want that child out there unnecessarily. COVID-19 is fucking random. Sure, it kills old, sick people. But it also kills the young & healthy. Even if it spares your life, it can leave you permanently fucked up. We can hold out for the vaccine.
